distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for liblouis and python-louis fixes the following issue:

Security issue fixed: 

- CVE-2018-17294: Fixed an out of bounds read in matchCurrentInput function
  which could allow a remote attacker to cause Denail of Service (bsc#1109319).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: The matchCurrentInput function inside lou_translateString.c of Liblouis prior to 3.7 does not check the input string's length, allowing attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash via out-of-bounds read) by crafting an input file with certain translation dictionaries.
notes.title: CVE description
